core.name: Quantum Framework Synthesis Engine
core.description: Leverages quantum machine learning to dynamically merge and optimize business frameworks (SWOT, AIDA, JTBD) with real-time design principles for self-optimizing UI/UX architectures

core.name: Neuroadaptive Design Grammar
core.description: Generates UI/UX solutions using brainwave pattern recognition and GANs, evolving design patterns from both human cognitive data and historical analytics

core.name: Quantum Adaptive UI Engine
core.description: Real-time UI optimization engine using quantum computing to adapt interface elements based on micro-expressions, eye-tracking, and contextual environmental data

supporting.name: AI-Driven Competitive UI Ecosystem
supporting.description: Uses real-time social listening and NLP to map competitor UI/UX ecosystems, generating differentiation strategies via evolutionary algorithms

supporting.name: Cultural Immersion AR Lab
supporting.description: Augmented reality testbed for simulating regional design norms, cultural symbolism, and linguistic patterns in real-time UI prototypes

supporting.name: Ethnographic Design Translator
supporting.description: AI-powered cultural adaptation engine using deep ethnographic data and symbolic anthropology to auto-generate culturally appropriate UI variants

integration.name: Blockchain-Driven UI Governance
integration.description: Immutable ledger system mapping Business Model Canvas components to UI/UX features with smart contract-based prioritization and stakeholder consensus

integration.name: Neurobiometric Feedback Loop
integration.description: Integrates fMRI-derived cognitive metrics with UI performance analytics using edge computing for real-time neural interface optimization

integration.name: Quantum UI Pipeline Orchestrator
integration.description: Coordinates quantum-classical hybrid workflows for UI development, optimizing resource allocation through quantum annealing algorithms

analytics.name: Quantum Trend Anticipation Engine
analytics.description: Predicts UI/UX evolution using quantum-enhanced SOSTAC analysis combined with blockchain-based sentiment analysis across global social networks

analytics.name: Neurocognitive Load Matrix
analytics.description: 3D heatmapping of cognitive load using multi-modal biometrics (EEG, GSR, eye-tracking) with real-time predictive analytics

analytics.name: Ethical Impact Simulator
analytics.description: Quantum Monte Carlo simulations to predict ethical risks of UI/UX designs across 100+ socio-political scenarios before deployment

future.name: Bio-Quantum UI Prototyper
future.description: Generates design permutations using quantum-biological computing, simulating evolutionary design principles across synthetic biology-inspired frameworks

future.name: Quantum Ethical Guardian
future.description: Self-auditing framework using quantum entanglement for real-time ethical compliance monitoring across all UI/UX layers

future.name: Neuromorphic UI Evolutionary Engine
future.description: Simulates brain-like UI adaptation using neuromorphic computing, evolving interfaces through artificial synaptic plasticity mechanisms
